---
title: "ggplot Grouped Bar Chart"
author: "Devlin Moyer"
date: "13 11 2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r fig.width=10}
bitstrings_df <- read.csv("bitstrings.csv", colClasses = c("factor", "numeric", "numeric"))
ggplot(bitstrings_df, aes(x = rxn_count, y = occurences)) + geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity", aes(fill = bitstring)) + theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(x = "Number of Reactions", y = "Number of Times Network Was Observed", title = "Results of 1000 Random Prunes of Network with 161 Reactions")
```

```{r}
bitstrings_df$bitstring
```
